DOC.brief_summary: Investigators selected participants who operated by laparoscopic technique due to any gynecologic indication according to random number table. The ten mm trocar was inserted supraumbilical, infraumbilical and intraumbilical. The verres needle was not used in all of patients. One month after we evaluated umbilical scar by used vancouver scar scale and compared results of vancouver scar scale.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Different Umbilical Port Entry Techniques in Terms of Cosmetic Results
DOC.criteria: Participant with eligible for laparoscopic surgery Participant with umbilical scar due to previous surgery, burn eg.
